newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: TABLE - NZ ADRs mixed in NY, as Dow pares gains.
newsitem.headline: TABLE - NZ ADRs mixed in NY, as Dow pares gains.

text.p: New Zealand ADRs were mixed in late New York trade as the Dow Jones Industrial Index dropped 28 points to 8010 at 7.45 a.m. NZT.
Price movements of NZ stocks listed in the U.S. and Australia.

Notes - In New York, Telecom's American Depository Receipts are traded in bundles of eight shares, while both the Fletcher Challenge shares are in bundles of 10 each. Tranz Rail ADSs are groups of three ordinary shares.
- Asterisk * means stock is still trading
